mr tulrumbleonce mayor of mudfog mudfog be pleasant towna remarkably pleasant townsituated in charming hollow by side of river from river mudfog derives agreeable scent of pitch tar coal rope yarn roving population in oilskin hat pretty steady influx of drunken bargeman great many other maritime advantage there be good deal of water about mudfog yet be not exactly sort of town for watering place water be perverse sort of element at best of time in mudfog be particularly so in winter come oozing down street tumbling over fieldsnay rush into very cellar kitchen of house with lavish prodigality might well be dispensed with in hot summer weather will dry up turn green although green be very good colour in way especially in grass still certainly be not becoming to water can not be denied that beauty of mudfog be rather impaired even by trifling circumstance mudfog be healthy placevery healthydamp perhaps none worse for mistake to suppose damp be unwholesome plant thrive best in damp situation why shouldnt men inhabitant of mudfog be unanimous in asserting that there exists not finer race of people on face of earth here have indisputable veracious contradiction of vulgar error at once so admitting mudfog to be damp distinctly state that be salubrious town of mudfog be extremely picturesque limehouse ratcliff highway be something like give very faint idea of mudfog there be great many more public house in mudfogmore than in ratcliff highway limehouse put together public building too be very imposing consider town one of finest specimen of shed architecture extant be combination of pig sty tea garden box order simplicity of design be of surpassing beauty idea of placing large window on one side of door small one on other be particularly happy there be fine old doric beauty too about padlock scraper be strictly in keeping with general effect in room do mayor corporation of mudfog assemble together in solemn council for public weal seated on massive wooden bench with table in centre form only furniture of whitewashed apartment sage men of mudfog spend hour after hour in grave deliberation here settle at what hour of night public house will be closed at what hour of morning will be permitted to open how soon will be lawful for people to eat dinner on church day other great political question sometimes long after silence have fallen on town distant light from shop house have ceased to twinkle like far off star to sight of boatman on river illumination in two unequal sized window of town hall warns inhabitant of mudfog that little body of legislator like larger better known body of same genus great deal more noisy not whit more profound be patriotically dozing away in company far into night for country good among knot of sage learned men one be so eminently distinguished during many year for quiet modesty of appearance demeanour a nicholas tulrumble well known coal dealer however exciting subject of discussion however animated tone of debate however warm personality exchanged even in mudfog get personal sometimes nicholas tulrumble be always same to say truth nicholas being industrious man always up betimes be apt to fall asleep when debate began to remain asleep till be over when must wake up very much refreshed give vote with greatest complacency fact be that nicholas tulrumble knowing that everybody there have made up mind beforehand considered talking a just long botheration about nothing at to present hour remains question whether on point at event tulrumble be not pretty near right time strews man head with silver sometimes fill pocket with gold a gradually performed one good office for nicholas tulrumble be obliging enough not to omit other nicholas began life in wooden tenement of four foot square with capital of two ninepence stock in trade of three bushel half of coal exclusive of large lump hung by way of sign board outside then enlarged shed kept truck then left shed truck too started donkey mr tulrumble then moved again set up cart cart be soon afterwards exchanged for waggon so went on like great predecessor whittingtononly without cat for partnerincreasing in wealth fame until at last gave up business altogether retired with mr tulrumble family to mudfog hall have erected on something attempted to delude into belief be hill about quarter of mile distant from town of mudfog about time began to be murmured in mudfog that nicholas tulrumble be growing vain haughty that prosperity success have corrupted simplicity of manner tainted natural goodness of heart in short that be setting up for public character great gentleman affected to look down upon old companion with compassion contempt whether report be at time well founded not certain be that mr tulrumble very shortly afterwards started four wheel chaise driven by tall postilion in yellow capthat mr tulrumble junior took to smoking cigar calling footman fellerand mr tulrumble from time forth be more seen in old seat in chimney corner of lighterman arm at night looked bad more than began to be observed that mr nicholas tulrumble attended corporation meeting more frequently than heretofore no longer went to sleep a have done for so many year propped eyelid open with two forefinger that read newspaper by at home that be in habit of indulging abroad in distant mysterious allusion to mass of people property of country productive power monied interest of denoted proved that nicholas tulrumble be mad worse puzzled good people of mudfog amazingly at length about middle of month of october mr tulrumble family went up to london middle of october being a mr tulrumble informed acquaintance in mudfog very height of fashionable season somehow other just about time despite health preserving air of mudfog mayor died be most extraordinary circumstance have lived in mudfog for eighty five year corporation didnt understand at indeed be with great difficulty one old gentleman who be great stickler for form be dissuaded from proposing vote of censure on such unaccountable conduct strange a be however die did without taking slightest notice of corporation corporation be imperatively called upon to elect successor so met for purpose being very full of nicholas tulrumble just then nicholas tulrumble being very important man elected wrote off to london by very next post to acquaint nicholas tulrumble with new elevation now being november time mr nicholas tulrumble being in capital fell out that be present at lord mayor show dinner at sight of glory splendour whereof mr tulrumble be greatly mortified inasmuch a reflection must force on mind have be born in london instead of in mudfog might have be lord mayor too have patronized judge be affable to lord chancellor friendly with premier coldly condescending to secretary to treasury have dined with flag behind back done great many other act deed unto lord mayor of london peculiarly appertain more thought of lord mayor more enviable personage seemed to be king be very well what be king to lord mayor when king made speech everybody knew be somebody el writing whereas here be lord mayor talking away for hour out of own headamidst enthusiastic applause of whole company while be notorious that king might talk to parliament till be black in face without getting so much a single cheer a reflection passed through mind of mr nicholas tulrumble lord mayor of london appeared to greatest sovereign on face of earth beating emperor of russia to nothing leaving great mogul immeasurably behind mr nicholas tulrumble be pondering over thing inwardly cursing fate have pitched coal shed in mudfog when letter of corporation be put into hand crimson flush mantled over face a read for vision of brightness be already dancing before imagination dear said mr tulrumble to wife have elected mayor of mudfog lor mussy said mr tulrumble why whats become of old sniggs late mr sniggs mr tulrumble said mr tulrumble sharply for by mean approved of notion of unceremoniously designating gentleman who filled high office of mayor a old sniggsthe late mr sniggs mr tulrumble be dead communication be very unexpected mr tulrumble only ejaculated lor mussy once again a if mayor be mere ordinary christian at mr tulrumble frowned gloomily what pity tant in london aint said mr tulrumble after short pause what pity tant in london where might have have show might have show in mudfog if thought proper apprehend said mr tulrumble mysteriously lor so might declare replied mr tulrumble good one too said mr tulrumble delightful exclaimed tulrumble one must rather astonish ignorant people down there said mr tulrumble must kill with envy said mr tulrumble so be agreed that majesty liege in mudfog must be astonished with splendour slaughtered with envy that show must take place a have never be seen in town in other town beforeno not even in on very next day after receipt of letter down came tall postilion in post chaisenot upon one of horse insideactually inside chaiseand driving up to very door of town hall where corporation be assembled delivered letter written by lord know who signed by nicholas tulrumble in nicholas said through four side of closely written gilt edged hot pressed bath post letter paper that responded to call of fellow townsman with feeling of heartfelt delight that accepted arduous office confidence have imposed upon that must never find shrinking from discharge of duty that must endeavour to execute function with dignity magnitude importance demanded great deal more to same effect even be not tall postilion produced from right hand top boot damp copy of afternoon number of county paper there in large type running whole length of very first column be long address from nicholas tulrumble to inhabitant of mudfog in said that cheerfully complied with requisition in short a if to prevent mistake about matter told over again what grand fellow meant to be in very much same term a in have already told about matter in letter corporation stared at one very hard at then looked a if for explanation to tall postilion a tall postilion be intently contemplating gold tassel on top of yellow cap must have afforded explanation whatever even if thought have be entirely disengaged contented with coughing very dubiously looking very grave tall postilion then delivered letter in tulrumble informed corporation that intended repairing to town hall in grand state gorgeous procession on monday afternoon next ensuing at corporation looked still more solemn a epistle wound up with formal invitation to whole body to dine with mayor on day at mudfog hall mudfog hill mudfog began to see fun of thing directly sent back compliment theyd be sure to come now there happened to be in mudfog a somehow other there doe happen to be in almost town in british dominion perhaps in foreign dominion toowe think very likely being great traveller can not distinctly saythere happened to be in merry tempered pleasant faced good for nothing sort of vagabond with invincible dislike to manual labour unconquerable attachment to strong beer spirit whom everybody knew nobody except wife took trouble to quarrel with who inherited from ancestor appellation of edward twigger rejoiced in sobriquet of bottle nosed ned be drunk upon average once day penitent upon equally fair calculation once month when be penitent be invariably in very last stage of maudlin intoxication be ragged roving roaring kind of fellow with burly form sharp wit ready head must turn hand to anything when chose to do be by mean opposed to hard labour on principle for must work away at cricket match by day togetherrunning catching batting bowling revelling in toil must exhaust galley slave must have be invaluable to fire office never be man with natural taste for pumping engine running up ladder throwing furniture out of two pair of stair window be only element in be at home be humane society in portable drag animated life preserver have saved more people in time from drowning than plymouth life boat captain manbys apparatus with qualification notwithstanding dissipation bottle nosed ned be general favourite authority of mudfog remembering numerous service to population allowed in return to get drunk in own way without fear of stock fine imprisonment have general licence showed sense of compliment by making most of have be thus particular in describing character avocation of bottle nosed ned because enables to introduce fact politely without hauling into reader presence with indecent haste by head shoulder brings very naturally to relate on very same evening on mr nicholas tulrumble family returned to mudfog mr tulrumbles new secretary just imported from london with pale face light whisker thrust head down to very bottom of tie in at tap room door of lighterman arm inquiring whether one ned twigger be luxuriating within announced a bearer of message from nicholas tulrumble esquire requiring mr twiggers immediate attendance at hall on private particular business being by mean mr twiggers interest to affront mayor rose from fireplace with slight sigh followed light whiskered secretary through dirt wet of mudfog street up to mudfog hall without further ado mr nicholas tulrumble be seated in small cavern with skylight called library sketching out plan of procession on large sheet of paper into cavern secretary ushered ned twigger well twigger said nicholas tulrumble condescendingly there be time when twigger must have replied well nick be in day of truck couple of year before donkey so only bowed want to go into training twigger said mr tulrumble what for sir inquired ned with stare hush hush twigger said mayor shut door mr jennings look here twigger a mayor said unlocked high closet disclosed complete suit of brass armour of gigantic dimension want to wear next monday twigger said mayor bless heart soul sir replied ned might a well ask to wear seventy four tipped over instantlyan accident mr tulrumble clearly demonstrated to be occasioned by not having counteracting weight of brass on leg now wear that with grace propriety on monday next said tulrumble more than once can solemnly testify to having seen judge with very strong symptom of dinner under wig however thats here there next day day following day after ned twigger be securely locked up in small cavern with sky light hard at work at armour with additional piece must manage to stand upright in have additional glass of rum at last after many partial suffocation contrived to get on whole suit to stagger up down room in like intoxicated effigy from westminster abbey never be man so delighted a nicholas tulrumble never be woman so charmed a nicholas tulrumbles wife here be sight for common people of mudfog live man in brass armour why must go wild with daythe mondayarrived if morning have be made to order couldnt have be better adapted to purpose never showed better fog in london on lord mayor day than enwrapped town of mudfog on eventful occasion have risen slowly surely from green stagnant water with first light of morning until reached little above lamp post top there have stopped with sleepy sluggish obstinacy bade defiance to sun who have got up very blood shot about eye a if have be at drinking party over night be doing day work with worst possible grace thick damp charger intended to represent herald bearing much stronger resemblance to court card on horseback be one of circus people who always came down to mudfog at time of year who have be engaged by nicholas tulrumble expressly for occasion there be horse whisking tail about balancing on hind leg flourishing away with fore foot in manner must have gone to heart soul of reasonable crowd mudfog crowd never be reasonable one in probability never will be instead of scattering very fog with shout a ought most indubitably to have done be fully intended to do by nicholas tulrumble sooner recognized herald than began to growl forth most unqualified disapprobation at bare notion of riding like other man if have come out on head indeed jumping through hoop flying through red hot drum even standing on one leg with other foot in mouth might have have something to say to for professional gentleman to sit astride in saddle with foot in stirrup be rather too good joke so herald be decided failure crowd after week how have sat at window opposite jolly boatman for two day together to count people who went in for beer between hour of twelve one oclock alonewhich by bye be time at great majority of mudfog people dined then went on to state how number of people who came out with beer jug averaged twenty one in five minute being multiplied by twelve gave two hundred fifty two people with beer jug in hour multiplied again by fifteen number of hour during house be open daily yielded three thousand seven hundred eighty people with beer jug per day twenty six thousand four hundred sixty people of high street about hour ago have occasioned much confusion general impression be that be accident pray heaven may prove so tuesday noon at early hour morning bell of church struck seven oclock original pig stable be currently reported that gentleman have arrived here for purpose of attending association from what have heard consider extremely probable although nothing decisive be yet known continue so five oclock be now ascertained beyond doubt that professor snore doze wheezy will not repair to pig tinder box have actually engaged apartment at original pig intelligence be exclusive leave reader to draw own inference from why professor wheezy of people in world must repair to original pig in preference to pig tinder box be not easy to conceive professor be man who must be above past six have just heard that boy who fell through pastrycooks window last night have died of fright be suddenly called upon to pay three sixpence for damage done constitution seems be not strong have just be rung for with instinct must appear almost result of reason sagacious animal seized waiter by calf of leg when approached to take made desperate though ineffectual resistance have not be retreated growling beneath article of furniture be keeping professor at bay conjecture be confirmed by testimony of ostler who after peeping through keyhole assures that distinctly saw professor nogo on knee holding forth small bottle of prussic acid to animal who be crouched beneath arm chair obstinately declined to smell can not imagine feverish state of irritation be in lest interest of science must be sacrificed to prejudice of brute creature who be not endowed with sufficient sense to foresee incalculable benefit whole human race may derive from so very slight concession on part nine oclock dog tail ear have be sent down stair to be washed from circumstance infer that animal be more foreleg have be delivered to boot to be brushed strengthens supposition half after ten feeling be informed morning that civil authority apprehensive of outbreak of popular feeling have commanded recruiting sergeant two corporal to be under arm that with view of not irritating people unnecessarily by presence have be requested to take up position before daybreak in turnpike distant about quarter of mile from town vigour promptness of measure can not be too highly extolled intelligence have just in place be supposed to be cause of wretch animosity be added that declaration be loudly cheered by crowd of person who have assembled on spot that one man have boldness to designate mr slug aloud by opprobrious epithet of stick in mud be earnestly to be hoped that now when moment have arrived for interference magistrate will not shrink from exercise of power be vested in by constitution of common country half past ten disturbance be happy to inform have be completely quelled ringleader taken into custody have pail of cold water thrown over previous to being locked up express great contrition uneasiness be in fever of anticipation about to morrow now that be within few hour of meeting of association at last enjoy proud consciousness of having illustrious member amongst trust hope usual hour did not observe anything particular in aspect of glorious planet except that appeared to might have be delusion of heightened fancy to shine with more than common brilliancy to shed refulgent lustre upon town such a have never observed before be more extraordinary a sky be perfectly cloudless atmosphere peculiarly fine at half past nine oclock general committee assembled with gentleman be paper inkstand round room on elevated bench extending a far a form must reach be assembled brilliant concourse of lovely elegant woman for mudfog be justly acknowledged to be without rival in whole world contrast between fair face dark coat trouser of scientific gentleman will never cease to remember while memory hold seat time having be allowed for slight confusion occasioned by falling down of greater part of platform to subside president called on one of secretary to read communication entitled remark on industrious flea with consideration on importance of establishing infant school among numerous class of society of directing industry to useful practical end of applying surplus fruit thereof towards providing for comfortable respectable maintenance in old age author stated that having long turned attention to moral social condition of interesting animal have be induced to visit exhibition in regent street london commonly known by designation of industrious flea have there seen many flea occupied certainly in various pursuit avocation occupied be bound to add in manner man of well regulated mind must fail to regard with sorrow regret one flea reduced to level of beast of burden be drawing about miniature gig containing particularly small effigy of grace duke of wellington while be staggering beneath weight of golden model of great adversary napoleon bonaparte brought up a mountebank ballet dancer be performing figure dance regretted to observe of flea so employed several be female others be in training in small card board box for pedestriansmere sporting charactersand two be actually engaged in cold blooded barbarous occupation of duelling pursuit from humanity recoiled with horror disgust suggested that measure must be immediately taken to employ labour of flea a part parcel of productive power of country might easily be done by establishment among of infant school house of industry in system of virtuous education based upon sound principle must be observed moral precept strictly inculcated proposed that flea who presumed to exhibit for hire music dancing specie of theatrical entertainment without licence must be considered vagabond treated accordingly in respect only placed upon level with rest of mankind must further suggest that labour must be placed under control regulation of state who must set apart from profit fund for support of superannuated disabled flea widow orphan with view proposed that liberal premium must be offered for three best design for general almshouse from whichas insect architecture be well known to be in very advanced perfect statewe might possibly derive many valuable hint for improvement of metropolitan university national gallery other public edifice president wished to be informed how ingenious gentleman proposed to open communication with flea generally in first instance so that might be thoroughly imbued with sense of advantage must necessarily derive from changing mode of life applying to honest labour appeared to only difficulty author submitted that difficulty be easily overcome rather that there be difficulty at in case obviously course to be pursued if majesty government must be prevailed upon to take up plan must be to secure at remunerative salary individual to whom have alluded a presiding over exhibition in regent street at period of visit that gentleman must at once be able to put in communication with mass of flea to instruct in pursuance of general plan of education to be sanctioned by parliament until such time a more intelligent among be advanced enough to officiate a teacher to rest president several member of section highly complimented author of paper last read on most ingenious important treatise be determined that subject must be recommended to immediate consideration of council mr wigsby produced cauliflower somewhat larger than chaise umbrella have be raised by other artificial mean than simple application of highly carbonated soda water a manure explained that by scooping out head must afford new delicious specie of nourishment for poor parachute in principle something similar to constructed by m garnerin be at once obtained stalk of course being kept downwards added that be perfectly willing to make descent from height of not le than three mile quarter have in fact already proposed same to proprietor of vauxhall garden who in handsomest manner at once consented to wish appointed early day next summer for undertaking merely stipulating that rim of cauliflower must be previously broken in three four place to ensure safety of descent president congratulated public on grand gala in store for warmly eulogised proprietor of establishment alluded to for love of science regard for safety of human life of did highest honour member wished to know how many thousand additional lamp royal property must be illuminated with on night after descent mr wigsby replied that point be not yet finally decided believed be proposed over above ordinary illumination to exhibit in various device eight million half of additional lamp member expressed much gratified with announcement mr blunderum delighted section with most interesting valuable paper on last moment of learned pig produced very strong impression on assembly account being compiled from personal recollection of favourite attendant account stated in most emphatic term that animal name be not toby solomon distinctly proved that must have near relative in profession a many designing person have falsely stated inasmuch a father mother brother sister have fallen victim to butcher at different time uncle of indeed have with very great labour be traced to sty in somers town a be in very infirm state at time being afflicted with measles shortly afterwards disappeared there appeared too much reason to conjecture that have be converted into sausage disorder of learned pig be originally severe cold being aggravated by excessive trough indulgence finally settled upon lung terminated in general decay of constitution melancholy instance of presentiment entertained by animal of approaching dissolution be recorded after gratifying numerous fashionable company with performance in falling off be visible fixed eye on biographer turning to watch lay on floor on be accustomed to point out hour deliberately passed snout occurred within own practice strikingly illustrative of power of medicine a exemplified in successful treatment of virulent disorder have be called in to visit patient on st of april be then labouring that have be put into active operation in fleet street strand other thoroughfare have never be once known to fail after slight delay occasioned by various member of section buttoning pocket president narrowly inspected invention declared that have never seen machine of more beautiful exquisite construction must inventor be good enough to inform section whether have taken what mean for bringing into general operation mr crinkle stated that after encountering preliminary difficulty have succeeded in putting in communication with mr fogle hunter other gentleman connected with swell mob who have awarded invention very highest most unqualified approbation regretted to say however that distinguished practitioner in common with gentleman of name of gimlet eyed tommy other member of secondary grade of profession whom be understood to represent entertained insuperable objection to being brought into general use on ground that must have inevitable effect of almost entirely superseding manual labour throwing great number of highly deserving person out of employment president hoped that such fanciful objection must be allowed to stand in way of such great public improvement mr crinkle hoped so too feared that if gentleman of swell mob persevered in objection nothing must be done professor grime suggested that surely in case majesty government might be prevailed upon to take up mr crinkle said that if objection be found to be insuperable must apply to parliament thought must not fail to recognise utility of invention president observed that up to time parliament have certainly got on very well without a did business on very large scale have doubt must gladly adopt improvement only fear be that machine might be worn out by constant working mr coppernose called attention of section to proposition of great magnitude interest illustrated by vast number of model stated with much clearness perspicuity in treatise entitled practical suggestion on necessity of providing harmless wholesome relaxation for young nobleman of england proposition be that space of ground of not le than ten mile in length four in breadth must be purchased by new company to be incorporated by act of parliament inclosed by brick wall of not le than twelve foot in height proposed that must be laid out with highway road turnpike bridge miniature village object must conduce to comfort glory of four in hand club so that might be fairly presumed to require drive beyond delightful retreat must be fitted up with most commodious extensive stable for convenience of such of nobility gentry a have taste for ostlering with house of entertainment furnished in most expensive handsome style must be further provided with whole street of door knocker bell handle of extra size so constructed that must be easily wrenched off at night regularly screwed on again by attendant provided for purpose day there must also be gas lamp of real glass must be broken at comparatively small expense per dozen broad handsome foot pavement for gentleman to drive cabriolet upon when be humorously disposedfor full enjoyment of feat live pedestrian must be procured from workhouse at very small charge per head place being inclosed carefully screened from intrusion of public there must be objection to gentleman laying aside article of costume be considered to interfere with pleasant frolic indeed to walking about without costume at if liked that better in short facility of enjoyment must be afforded that most gentlemanly person must possibly desire a even advantage must be incomplete unless there be mean provided of enabling nobility gentry to display prowess when sallied forth after dinner a inconvenience might be experienced in event of being reduced to necessity of pummelling other inventor have turned attention to construction of entirely new police force composed exclusively of automaton figure with assistance of ingenious signor gagliardi of windmill street in haymarket have succeeded in making with such nicety that policeman cab driver old woman made upon principle of model exhibited must walk about until knocked down like real man nay more if set upon beaten by six eight nobleman gentleman after be down figure must utter diver groan mingled with entreaty for mercy thus rendering illusion complete enjoyment perfect invention did not
